item.title: HTTP Server
item.description: Monstache has a built in HTTP server that you can enable with –enable-http-server. It listens on :8080 by default but you can change this with –http-server-addr. When using monstache with kubernetes this server can be used to detect liveness and act accordingly The following endpoints are available /started Returns the uptime of the server /healthz Returns at 200 status code with the text “ok” when monstache is running /stats Returns the current indexing statistics in JSON format.
